name: MyHouseholdChores
0:
”Alexa, ask chores picker to give me a household chore”
”Alexa, ask chores picker what's my household chore”
”Alexa, ask chores picker what should I do”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chores picker
des: Don't push the household chores back any more! This skill will give you a random but specific household chore at a time, so that you can just do as little as one chore and be done for the day. At the end of the week or month, discover a super clean house!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
